title: Time Will Tell
description: Everything has been turned upside down in Briar Creek. Gabe is locked in a room all by himself, trying to find a way out, but is left to wonder why his deranged twin brother would leave him there in the first place. Meanwhile, Anna is off to Westbrooke to become a blood donor so she can decide if she really loves Austin or if she only loves being a blood donor. Dan and Lexi are trying to deal with the Caroline and Gabe situation. And Mary-Kate? She has plans of her own.
author: Jayme Morse
